analysis.description:
RefundableCrowdsale.goalReached (/unique_chucks/10/0x0f1f2c619fa8a05fcce5233aa8c67e943d1957ee.sol#709-717) is declared view but changes state variables:
	- RefundableCrowdsale._goalReached

Reentrancy in Crowdsale.bountyFunds (/unique_chucks/10/0x0f1f2c619fa8a05fcce5233aa8c67e943d1957ee.sol#523-531):
	External calls:
	- token.mint(0x4311E7B5a249B8D2CC7CcD98Dc7bE45d8ce94e39,remainingBountySupply) (/unique_chucks/10/0x0f1f2c619fa8a05fcce5233aa8c67e943d1957ee.sol#529-530)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- remainingBountySupply (/unique_chucks/10/0x0f1f2c619fa8a05fcce5233aa8c67e943d1957ee.sol#531)

Reentrancy in Crowdsale.burnToken (/unique_chucks/10/0x0f1f2c619fa8a05fcce5233aa8c67e943d1957ee.sol#510-522):
	External calls:
	- token.burnTokens(remainingPublicSupply) (/unique_chucks/10/0x0f1f2c619fa8a05fcce5233aa8c67e943d1957ee.sol#514-516)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- remainingPublicSupply (/unique_chucks/10/0x0f1f2c619fa8a05fcce5233aa8c67e943d1957ee.sol#520)

Reentrancy in Crowdsale.grantReserveToken (/unique_chucks/10/0x0f1f2c619fa8a05fcce5233aa8c67e943d1957ee.sol#534-538):
	External calls:
	- token.mint(0x4C355A270bC49A18791905c1016603906461977a,remainingReserveSupply) (/unique_chucks/10/0x0f1f2c619fa8a05fcce5233aa8c67e943d1957ee.sol#536-538)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- remainingReserveSupply (/unique_chucks/10/0x0f1f2c619fa8a05fcce5233aa8c67e943d1957ee.sol#538)

Crowdsale.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/10/0x0f1f2c619fa8a05fcce5233aa8c67e943d1957ee.sol#409-490) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(beneficiary,tokens) (/unique_chucks/10/0x0f1f2c619fa8a05fcce5233aa8c67e943d1957ee.sol#486)

Crowdsale.burnToken (/unique_chucks/10/0x0f1f2c619fa8a05fcce5233aa8c67e943d1957ee.sol#510-522) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.burnTokens(remainingPublicSupply) (/unique_chucks/10/0x0f1f2c619fa8a05fcce5233aa8c67e943d1957ee.sol#514-516)

Crowdsale.bountyFunds (/unique_chucks/10/0x0f1f2c619fa8a05fcce5233aa8c67e943d1957ee.sol#523-531) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(0x4311E7B5a249B8D2CC7CcD98Dc7bE45d8ce94e39,remainingBountySupply) (/unique_chucks/10/0x0f1f2c619fa8a05fcce5233aa8c67e943d1957ee.sol#529-530)

Crowdsale.grantReserveToken (/unique_chucks/10/0x0f1f2c619fa8a05fcce5233aa8c67e943d1957ee.sol#534-538) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(0x4C355A270bC49A18791905c1016603906461977a,remainingReserveSupply) (/unique_chucks/10/0x0f1f2c619fa8a05fcce5233aa8c67e943d1957ee.sol#536-538)

Crowdsale.transferToken (/unique_chucks/10/0x0f1f2c619fa8a05fcce5233aa8c67e943d1957ee.sol#549-560) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(beneficiary,tokens) (/unique_chucks/10/0x0f1f2c619fa8a05fcce5233aa8c67e943d1957ee.sol#559)

Reentrancy in Crowdsale.burnToken (/unique_chucks/10/0x0f1f2c619fa8a05fcce5233aa8c67e943d1957ee.sol#510-522):
	External calls:
	- token.burnTokens(remainingPublicSupply) (/unique_chucks/10/0x0f1f2c619fa8a05fcce5233aa8c67e943d1957ee.sol#514-516)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- icoSupply (/unique_chucks/10/0x0f1f2c619fa8a05fcce5233aa8c67e943d1957ee.sol#521)
	- preSaleSupply (/unique_chucks/10/0x0f1f2c619fa8a05fcce5233aa8c67e943d1957ee.sol#520)
	- preicoSupply (/unique_chucks/10/0x0f1f2c619fa8a05fcce5233aa8c67e943d1957ee.sol#520-521)
	- totalSupply (/unique_chucks/10/0x0f1f2c619fa8a05fcce5233aa8c67e943d1957ee.sol#518-519)

Crowdsale.bountySupply should be constant (/unique_chucks/10/0x0f1f2c619fa8a05fcce5233aa8c67e943d1957ee.sol#293-295)
Crowdsale.publicSupply should be constant (/unique_chucks/10/0x0f1f2c619fa8a05fcce5233aa8c67e943d1957ee.sol#289-291)

GoldiamICO._endTime should be constant (/unique_chucks/10/0x0f1f2c619fa8a05fcce5233aa8c67e943d1957ee.sol)

GoldiamICO._startTime should be constant (/unique_chucks/10/0x0f1f2c619fa8a05fcce5233aa8c67e943d1957ee.sol)
GoldiamICO._wallet should be constant (/unique_chucks/10/0x0f1f2c619fa8a05fcce5233aa8c67e943d1957ee.sol)
